about_the_game:
You make me crazy! You make me crazy! You make me crazy! That's how I feel!

From the deepest dungeons of the Demon World (or, admittedly, from its most crowded night club), Lazor and Doll gets some official Beatdown Dungeon crossover costumes! Blast the opponent with Marv Lazor and bind them with Alisa Doll, while dancing on the beat!

Important Note

To use the Marv DLC costume, you need first to have unlocked Lazor Loyra by either:
  • clearing the game's arcade mode with Skeleton, Graf, Cyphr, Shaz, Mono, Amy, Jenn and Renzo OR
  • clearing the game's arcade mode 40 times OR
  • answering YES to the initial "unlock all characters" prompt OR
  • using one of the cheat codes listed in the Discussion threads.

To use the Alisa DLC costume, you need first to have unlocked Doll by either:
  • clearing the game's arcade mode with Skeleton, Graf, Krave, Evilobster, Wally, Lejl, Kaya (or Kiyoko) and Elena OR
  • clearing the game's arcade mode 30 times OR
  • finding and beating Doll in arcade mode OR
  • answering YES to the initial "unlock all characters" prompt OR
  • using one of the cheat codes listed in the Discussion threads.
